resource.description: Indicates the response contains an order object. Will always contain `order` for this endpoint.

profileId.description: The profile the order was created on.

method.description: The payment method last used when paying for the order.

mode.description: The mode used to create this payment.

shopperCountryMustMatchBillingCountry.description: If set to true during order creation, we restrict the payment methods available to your customer to methods from the billing country only.

orderNumber.description: Your order number that was used when creating the order.

locale.description: The locale used during checkout. Note that the locale may have been changed by your customer during checkout.

metadata.description: Data provided during the order creation.

redirectUrl.description: The URL your customer will be redirected to after completing or canceling the payment process.

createdAt.description: The order’s date and time of creation, in ISO 8601 format.
